document_data.name: Spells of Athalantar
document_data.mainbody: '''''Spells of Athalantar''''' was a [[spellbook]] featuring in a vision sent by [[Mystra]]. It of course pertained to the [[spell]]s of [[Athalantar]], the fallen Realm of the Stag.
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|767}}, [[Elminster Aumar]], a [[Chosen of Mystra]] and survivor of Athalantar, was shown a number of visions and temptations by [[Mystra]]. One of them was a room full of spellbooks, including one labeled ''Spells of Athalantar''. It was unclear whether specific books he saw actually existed outside of the vision.
